items.sentence: I gave Tom detailed instructions on how to do that.
I grew up in a small village not too far from here.
Tom had already gone to bed by the time I got home.
They put off their departure due to the heavy snow.
Tom showed himself to be a person of bad character.
Because of the rain, we didn't play tennis outside.
The locusts had destroyed everything in their path.
Tom laughed when he heard about what Mary had done.
Tom leaned against the wall and smoked a cigarette.
Tom left his sunglasses on the dashboard of my car.
Tom left the groceries in the back seat of the car.
Tom needed Mary's advice, but he couldn't find her.
Tom noticed that Mary was having trouble breathing.
Tom said Mary didn't look even a little bit scared.
Tom and I aren't the only ones who need to do that.
Tom and I were the only ones who wanted to do that.
Tom and I weren't the only ones who showed up late.
Tom and Mary ate dinner at an expensive restaurant.
Tom did something yesterday that he shouldn't have.
Tom didn't seem to be as busy as Mary seemed to be.
